definitions.text: (baseball) hitting a baseball so that it drops suddenly
make or move along with a sound as of a horse's hooves striking the ground
set (something or oneself) down with or as if with a noise
examples: He planked the money on the table
He planked himself into the sofa

definitions.text: pull lightly but sharply with a plucking motion
examples: he plucked the strings of his mandolin
plop came the ball down to the corner of the green
